constituent: mochi, eat, food, umbrella, good, halo, drop, silver, puzzle, horns, two hands
heisigStory: Mochi is the glutinous rice the Japanese pound into cakes. Its primitives are: food . . . puzzle.
koohiiStory1: Call your friend and he answers the phone "Mochi, mochi!" whatever he is eating sure is making it hard to understand. I will puzzle over the content of our conversation for some time to come.
koohiiStory2: Mochi ice cream is a puzzling food, I still have no idea how they get that ice cream in there, but it sure tastes good.
